name: Vacuum Decay
description:
Created in a month for the My little Roguelike #2 Game Jam.

A weird science project on a hostile alien planet resulted in the  destruction of the  universe.
The last remaining human consciousness finds itself in a strange robotic body.
Everything that happened before is happening again.

Vacuum Decay is a 2D sidescrolling roguelite action game.  There are over 30 upgrades and two endings to discover.

Best played with a gamepad.

[Game by fenchel (programming, 'art') and trollofix (music)]
